title: Oscar-mania strikes The Moxie
body: Wow. I mean... just... wow. SLUMDOG's nominations come as no surprise, but THE READER too?! When you have two screens, the odds of you playing a Best Picture nominee are scarce, but possible... and the odds for playing two, simultaneously?! I'm just slack-jawed, folks. Without words. It's going to be another big weekend, that's for sure. Word to the wise: BUY YOUR TICKETS EARLY! In other news, check out this story about SLUMDOG playing at The Moxie that ran on KSPR 33 a couple nights ago.
author: Dan
